#.description: All fields starting with '#' arg ignored

bareUrl.description:
Where to find a UF2 or BIN file with minimal DCFG.
Can be auto-populated.

binFlashOffset.description: If specified, will be used as part of output file name.

binGenericFlashOffset.description: If specified, this shows where the generic part of BIN file starts.

dcfgOffset.description: Where should DCFG be embedded in generic file.

genericUrl.description: Where to find a generic (without DCFG) UF2 or BIN file.

repoUrl.description:
Source repo, boards are assumed to sit in `boards/<arch-id>/<board-id>.board.json`
Auto-populated.

uf2Align.description:
Force alignment of the last page in the patched UF2 file.
Set to 4096 on RP2040 because wof RP2040-E14.
